SELECT SCHEDULE_NO /* 일정번호(PK) */ , MEMBER_NO /* 회원번호(FK) */ , CATEGORY_NO /* 카테고리번호(FK) */ , CONTENT /* 내용 */ , PLAN_DATE /* 날짜 */ , DDAY /* 디데이 */ , CASE DDAY WHEN '1' THEN '디데이' WHEN '2' THEN '기념일' ELSE '해당없음' END AS DDAY_NM /* 디데이구분명 */ , CASE DDAY WHEN '0' THEN -1 ELSE TO_DATE( TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD' ) ) - PLAN_DATE END AS DDAY_CNT /* 디데이일수 */ , COMPLETE /* 완료Y/N */ FROM SCHEDULE /* 일정 테이블 */ WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}
AND CATEGORY_NO = #{category_no}

SELECT SCHEDULE_NO /* 일정번호(PK) */ , MEMBER_NO /* 회원번호(FK) */ , CATEGORY_NO /* 카테고리번호(FK) */ , CONTENT /* 내용 */ , PLAN_DATE /* 날짜 */ , DDAY /* 디데이 */ , CASE DDAY WHEN '1' THEN '디데이' WHEN '2' THEN '기념일' ELSE '해당없음' END AS DDAY_NM /* 디데이구분명 */ , CASE DDAY WHEN '0' THEN -1 ELSE TO_DATE( TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD' ) ) - PLAN_DATE END AS DDAY_CNT /* 디데이일수 */ , COMPLETE /* 완료Y/N */ , TO_CHAR(PLAN_DATE, 'FMdd') AS DAY FROM SCHEDULE /* 일정 테이블 */ WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}
AND TO_CHAR(PLAN_DATE, 'FMMM') = #{month}

SELECT SCHEDULE_NO /* 일정번호(PK) */ , MEMBER_NO /* 회원번호(FK) */ , CATEGORY_NO /* 카테고리번호(FK) */ , CONTENT /* 내용 */ , PLAN_DATE /* 날짜 */ , DDAY /* 디데이 */ , CASE DDAY WHEN '1' THEN '디데이' WHEN '2' THEN '기념일' ELSE '해당없음' END AS DDAY_NM /* 디데이구분명 */ , CASE DDAY WHEN '0' THEN -1 ELSE TO_DATE( TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD' ) ) - PLAN_DATE END AS DDAY_CNT /* 디데이일수 */ , COMPLETE /* 완료Y/N */ FROM SCHEDULE /* 일정 테이블 */ WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(b.COMPLETE) FROM SCHEDULE b WHERE b.COMPLETE = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(b.PLAN_DATE) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE)) AS "Y_COUNT" ,(SELECT COUNT(c.COMPLETE) FROM SCHEDULE c WHERE c.COMPLETE = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(c.PLAN_DATE) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE)) AS "N_COUNT" , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SCHEDULE d WHERE d.MEMBER_NO = #{member_no} AND TO_CHAR(d.PLAN_DATE) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE)) AS "ALL_COUNT" FROM SCHEDULE a WHERE a.MEMBER_NO = #{member_no} AND ROWNUM = 1
